data.name: Alice
data.text: 性取向形成的原因之一有童年经历，这是写在论文里的，比例不小。

data.name: Bob
data.text: Re Alice: 能给看一下论文吗？因为我看到的说法是后天形成的证据不足

data.name: Bob
data.text: No causal theory of sexual orientation has yet gained widespread support. The most scientifically plausible causal hypotheses are difficult to test. However, there is considerably more evidence supporting nonsocial causes of sexual orientation than social causes.

post.text:
晚上跟一个百合姐妹聊天，她跟我说小时候被父母的一个朋友weixie过
我心里在想是不是因为这个，所以长大后就变成百合了...
好心疼
